                #include <bits/stdc++.h>
                using namespace std;
                typedef long long ll;

                int main() {
                    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr);
                    int N; cin >> N;
                    vector<ll> v(N);
                    for (auto& a : v) cin >> a;
                    ll tot = accumulate(v.begin(), v.end(), 0LL);
                    ll mx = *max_element(v.begin(), v.end());
                    vector<ll> prefix(N);
                    partial_sum(v.begin(), v.end(), prefix.begin());
                    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
                        mx = max(mx, (prefix[i] + i) / (i+1));
                    }
                    int Q; cin >> Q;
                    while (Q--) {
                        ll t; cin >> t;
                        if (t < mx) {
                            cout << -1 << '\n';
                        }
                        else {
                            cout << (tot + t - 1) / t << '\n';
                        }
                    }
                }
